title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7900.6 - State action
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7900.6 - State action

State Regulations

The State Energy Office shall evaluate all hardship and
emergency applications and issue State set-aside assignment and general
distribution orders in accordance with Parts 7901, 7902 and 7903 of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7900.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
